names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Folium Rhododendri Mollis Fructus Rhododendron Mollis (Liu Zhou Zi)

category: Herbs that Expel Wind and Dampness

action.primary: Dispels Wind, expels Dampness, eliminates Blood Stasis and relieves pain

indications: Rheumatism, headache, trauma and fracture pain, persistent tinea (fungal infection of the skin)

contraindications: Signs of toxicity: nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, low heart rate, low blood pressure, uncoordinated movements, difficulty breathing and in serious cases, breathing stops and death occurs.

notes: Fol. Rhododendri Mollis Nao Yang Hua and Fr. Rhodondendron Mollis (Liu Zhou Zi) used interchangeably.
